Question: Siteng Electronic CO., LTD CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Siteng Electronic CO., LTD

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- New 8K Ultra HD Smart TV
- Quantum Dot Technology
- Dolby Atmos Sound System
- Voice Control and Smart Assistant Integration
- Multiple HDMI and USB Ports
- Slim Bezel Design
- Integrated Streaming Apps
- High Dynamic Range (HDR) Support

四腾电子有限公司

- 新款8K超高清智能电视
- 量子点技术
- 杜比全景声系统
